name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bible Daily Verse with AI Generated Images

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read a daily verse with AI generated images from the bible. The official BiblePics.co extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BiblePics.co chrome extension is designed to provide users with a daily dose of inspiration and guidance. Each day, the extension will display a different verse from the Bible, chosen at random from a pre-selected collection of passages. 
The verse will be accompanied by an AI-generated image, which has been created to complement and enhance the message of the verse, plus with date and time.

The images are designed to be visually striking and thought-provoking, to help users reflect on the meaning of the verse and how it relates to their lives. 

This extension is perfect for those who want to start their day with a positive and uplifting message, or for anyone looking for a reminder of hope and encouragement throughout the day. Overall, this extension aims to make the Bible more accessible and relatable to people, who are looking for daily inspiration.
